name: Iron Leaves
flavorText: Many of its physical characteristics match those of a Virizion from the future that was covered in a paranormal magazine.

previous.name: Walking Wake
previous.flavorText: This ferocious creature is shrouded in mystery. It's named after an aquatic monster mentioned in an old expedition journal.

next.name: Dipplin
next.flavorText: Dipplin is two creatures in one Pokémon. Its evolution was triggered by a special apple grown only in one place.
